hero.title: Renderings, CAD & Carat studios on demand
hero.subtitle: Primex blends CGI artists, CAD specialists, and certified Carat planners into one pod that translates product data into immersive visuals, precise technical files, and shoppable kitchen experiences.

sections.offeringsSubtitle: Three dedicated workstreams cover every visual touchpoint—from marketing to technical drawings.

pillars.title: Renderings / CGI
pillars.body: Photorealistic scenes, cinematic flythroughs, and asset libraries built from your exact materials, lighting, and product data.

pillars.title: Graphic Design / CAD
pillars.body: Integrated brand design and production-grade documentation crafted by senior designers fluent in CAD, BIM, and retail specs.
items: CAD drawings, cut lists, install guides

pillars.title: 3D Kitchen / Carat Specialist
pillars.body: Certified Carat operators create kitchen layouts, VR-ready planners, and data-sync’d libraries for retailers and manufacturers.

benefits: Dedicated pods that combine CGI, CAD, and Carat expertise
Direct integration with your product data, PIM, and ERP
Fast feedback loops with European creative direction
Brand governance baked into every deliverable
Secure asset handover with version tracking
Scalable capacity for seasonal launches and rollouts

cta.title: Need a design strike team?
cta.body: Let’s assemble a Primex pod that ships renderings, CAD packs, and kitchen planners without breaking your timelines.
